title: Beef and Barley Soup
directions: Season the beef shanks really well with salt, pepper and dried thyme. Put the seasoned shanks in the crockpot first. Then add the chopped onions, carrots and diced tomatoes. Finish it off with the beef stock. Cook on low for about 8 hours. After 8 hours, stir the soup and add more stock, if necessary. Take out the beef shank pieces and chopped them up into bite size pieces.
ingredients: 2 cartons of beef stock, low sodium
